Author: Aleph0-4
Text: periods suck but osteoperosis and hormonal imbalances suck more. on the bright side, at least ovulation increases your core temp and you burn a bit more calories

Author: bir_die
Text: Yaaaa if you’re going through puberty, it’s a good thing to get your period. Puberty does rely on bodyfat, and does more than just give you boobs and hips. It also has a huge hand in brain development and even bone growth.   Not trying to push you for recovery but just be aware you’re in a pretty important growth stage of your life.   That being said I survived it at a similar bmi so 🤷🏻‍♀️ I just ain’t got tiddies
